fulltext:
Ngô Đình Thương
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
htt e/apps/dev?
id=
Summary
With 7 years of work and research in the field of Information Technology.
I have skills in Computer Vision, Product Development, Programing in C#, C++, Java Android.
I got a Master's degree in Information Science from the Kyoto Institute of Technology, Japan.
Experience
Senior Software Engineer
Nichietsu System Development
Sep 2020 - Mar 2021 (7 months)
"Femap" (Finite Element Modeling And Postprocessing) is an engineering analysis program that is used
to build finite element models of complex engineering problems ("pre-processing") and view solution
results ("postprocessing") in three-dimensions (3D).
Role: Technical Leader, Key-member; Size: 4 members; C# .NET, C++, Python
Computer Vision Engineer
AIOZ VIETNAM LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
Nov 2019 - Jun 2020 (8 months)
"OneKYC" (Know Your Customer) helps to prove that your document belongs to you with 3 steps:
capture your document based on your needs, live-matching your real face & your face in the document,
extract your information in the document.
Role: Researcher, Key-member; Size: 3 members; Android-Java, Python
Research Assistant
Image Processing Lab, Kyoto Institute of Technology
Sep 2017 - Sep 2019 (2 years 1 month)
"3D Reconstruction of Bladder Wall" is to create the 3D model of the bladder from endoscopic movies.
We also created the stitched 2D image. These are useful for bladder diagnosis.
Role: Researcher, Developer; Size: 1 member; C++, Python
3D Programmer
Seldat Distribution Inc.
Mar 2017 - Sep 2017 (7 months)
"3D Capture for Human Body" is to measure the human body using Kinect devices. We set up a capture
room to capture the 3D model of the human body and measure its sizes. These sizes are useful for
making clothes.
Role: Consultant, Problem solver; Size: 4 members; C# .NET
Ngô Đình Thương - page 1
Research Assistant - Internship
Image Processing Lab, Kyoto Institute of Technology
Oct 2016 - Dec 2016 (3 months)
"3D Reconstruction of Bladder Wall"
Role: Researcher, Developer; Size: 1 member; C++
Software Engineer in New Technology Division / (R&D) EMB Division
Global CyberSoft JSC
Sep 2014 - Sep 2015 (1 year 1 month)
"Network System"(1), we developed the RESTful API as a middleware to help the computer can monitor
the status of network devices or control them. "Smart Home"(2), we developed the application on the
computer and mobile phone to control home devices. "Public Safety"(3), we developed the techniques
to detect whether the transportation and pedestrians violate the traffic laws or not.
Role: Team Leader, Supporter, Key-member; Size: 5 members; C++, Python
Education
Kyoto Institute of Technology
Master of Engineering - MEng degree, Information Science - Scholarship program
2017 - 2019
VNUHCM - University of Science
Master student of Computer Science - Coordination program (VNUHCM - JAIST)
2015 - 2016
1. HCMUS (Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh University of Science)
2. JAIST (Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology)
VNUHCM - University of Science
Bachelor of Science - BS degree, Information Technology - Honor program
2010 - 2014
Licenses & Certifications
CISCO CERTIFIED NETWORK ASSOCIATE - Nhat Nghe Education JSC
2016 Global Internship Program - Kyoto Institute of Technology
KIT Bio Tech & IT Spring School - Kyoto Institute of Technology
Skills
Linux   •   Algorithms   •   Git   •   Computer Vision   •   Programming   •   Full-Stack Development   •   Technical
Research   •   Android Development   •   Product Development   •   3D Modeling
Ngô Đình Thương - page 2
